mapper.select: select a.oneyuangoods_id, a.oneyuangoodsimage_url, a.oneyuangoods_name, a.oneyuangoodsneed_quantity, a.nowtimes, a.value_a, a.value_b, a.value_a_text, a.value_b_text , a.createtime, a.member_id, a.locky_number, a.overtime, a.isover, a.createoprator_id, a.thistype_id, b.mylocky_number, date_format(b.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as membercreatetime, b.now_ip , b.getoneyuan_quantity, b.oneyuanmember_id, c.phone, c.name, c.image_url from tb_oneyuangoods a left join tb_oneyuanmember b on a.oneyuangoods_id=b.oneyuangoods_id and locate(a.locky_number,b.mylocky_number)=0 left join tb_member c on a.member_id=c.member_id where a.oneyuangoods_id = #{oneyuangoods_id} and a.nowtimes=#{nowtimes}

and oneyuangoods_name like concat(concat("%",#{pd.content}),"%")
